description: Try this lactose-free berry smoothie recipe that's quick and easy to make with only six ingredients. Almonds give this smoothie a delicious creamy texture.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Strawberry,Halal,High protein,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Berry Smoothies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Woolworths free from lactose lite milk

recipeInstructions.text: Place ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and combined.
Divide among serving glasses. Serve topped with coconut, strawberries and extra almonds.
